definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

sentences.english: The surface of nectary with modified stoma was covered by a thin-cuticle layer with ripple sculpture.
sentences.chinese: 分泌表皮具波紋狀角質層，表皮上分佈有氣孔器。

sentences.english: It is utilized in the manufacturing of bellows, filter bags, accordion skirting and other products.
sentences.chinese: 用在波紋管，過濾袋，百褶裙等產品的生產。

sentences.english: Multi-ply metallic bellows, in various alloys.
sentences.chinese: 各種合金制多層金屬波紋管。

sentences.english: When roughing with the insert not peripheral cutting edge.
sentences.chinese: 粗加工時沒有使用外切刃帶有波紋的刀具。

sentences.english: The corrugated rubber case and it's mold designing are introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹波紋式橡膠套的產品和模具設計過程。

sentences.english: Stones of grotesque forms are often attractive with underlaid lines and water holes.
sentences.chinese: 奇形怪狀的石頭常帶有引人注目的波紋，線條和水孔。

sentences.english: You can even make cupcakes out of the batter.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以不用麪糊做出波紋蛋糕。

sentences.english: The corrugations on the corrugated steel siding add rigidity and strength to this light metal.
sentences.chinese: 壁板上的波紋鋼波紋添加的剛性和力量，這輕金屬。

sentences.english: The corrugations on the corrugated steel siding add rigidity and strength to this light metal.
sentences.chinese: 壁板上的波紋鋼波紋添加的剛性和力量，這輕金屬。

sentences.english: A sudden breeze ruffled the surface of the water.
sentences.chinese: 一陣突然的微風使湖面突然起了波紋。

sentences.english: Corrugated steel siding is a stiffer material than aluminum.
sentences.chinese: 波紋鋼壁板是一種比鋁硬的材料。

sentences.english: Take some cobalt bluish-gray and paint it on the corrugated roof.
sentences.chinese: 採取一些鈷藍灰色，畫上它的波紋屋頂。

sentences.english: RF shield bellows have experienced a heat test and an impedance test.
sentences.chinese: 對高頻屏蔽波紋管進行了熱測試和阻抗測試。

sentences.english: The presence of striation area is one of the main characteristic on the surface generated by abrasive jet.
sentences.chinese: 波紋區域的存在是磨料射流切割表面的主要特徵之一。

definition: silvery light/bright white light/shining white light
pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
the feeling of actually being there
